start

OpenOffice.org GSI/SDF format

OpenOffice.org uses an internal format called SDF to manage localisation text. The toolkit can successfully manage all features of this format covnerting it to XLIFF or PO format with the oo2po and oo2xliff tools.

Features

  • Handles all translatable text from the SDF
  • Can also use 'x-comments' 'language' found in the SDF to provide translator comments
